name: Center for Environment Education
address: Nehru Foundation for Development Thaltej Tekra, Ahmedabad - 380 054
about: Center for Environment Education (CEE) is a renowned NGO dedicated to environmental education, disaster preparedness, and community empowerment. Through innovative programs and partnerships, we strive to educate children and youth about environmental conservation while fostering a culture of preparedness for disasters. Our initiatives aim to create a sustainable future where communities thrive in harmony with nature. Join us in our mission to protect the environment and build resilient communities.
impact: Last month, CEE provided meals to 1000 homeless individuals, conducted disaster preparedness workshops reaching 500 households, and facilitated environmental education programs for 300 children in marginalized communities.

name: Sanchetana Community Health and Research Centre
address: O-45, NewYork Trade CentreNr. Thaltej Cross RoadAhmedabad - 380054
about: Sanchetana Community Health and Research Centre is a beacon of hope for underserved communities, striving tirelessly to uplift and empower through comprehensive programs focused on child welfare, education, health, and human rights. Located at the heart of marginalized regions, our center serves as a catalyst for positive change, advocating for the rights and well-being of every individual regardless of socio-economic status.
impact: In the past year alone, Sanchetana Community Health and Research Centre has: Provided healthcare services to over 5,000 individuals, including immunizations, prenatal care, and treatment for common illnesses.
